entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D39l: TÁRKI - Founding of Pension Funds and Insurance Funds and Their Membership 1996. Population sample.. data sheet. Version: 2009-09-11

entry.dcterms:contributor: Supervisory Authority of Voluntary Reciprocal Insurance Companies
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: the survey investigates the foundation and the changes in the number of members of voluntary pension funds, health care funds and self-care funds; analyses the stratification differences between the members and the rest of the population; and tests the hypotheses relating to these differences
